languages.text: "Я снова не увидела зло там, где должна была... я подвела этих людей, смелых и верных. Но дело не только в этом. Я наивно думала, что вера и стойкость помогли нам — мне — прорваться сквозь козни отвратительных ксеносов. Что мы ищем путь на свободу. А на деле... это все была часть спектакля, и отвратительные отродья, видно, хохотали, наблюдая мою наивность".

traits.locale_text: "Я снова не увидела зло там, где должна была... я подвела этих людей, смелых и верных. Но дело не только в этом. Я наивно думала, что вера и стойкость помогли нам — мне — прорваться сквозь козни отвратительных ксеносов. Что мы ищем путь на свободу. А на деле... это все была часть спектакля, и отвратительные отродья, видно, хохотали, наблюдая мою наивность".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."
languages.original_text: "Я снова не увидела зло там, где должна была... я подвела этих людей, смелых и верных. Но дело не только в этом. Я наивно думала, что вера и стойкость помогли нам — мне — прорваться сквозь козни отвратительных ксеносов. Что мы ищем путь на свободу. А на деле... это все была часть спектакля, и отвратительные отродья, видно, хохотали, наблюдая мою наивность".

In truth... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling in glee as they were observing my foolishness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私はまたしても、大事なところで相手の悪意を見抜くことができなかった…忠実で勇敢な人々を失望させてしまった。それだけじゃないわ。信仰と忍耐が我々を…私の力となり、邪悪な異種族の陰謀を断ち切ったのだと、甘く考えていた。私たちは自由への道を歩んでいるのだと。でも実際は…すべて演技にすぎなかった。卑劣な怪物たちは私の愚かさをあざ笑っていたに違いないわ」
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: 「私はまたしても、大事なところで相手の悪意を見抜くことができなかった…忠実で勇敢な人々を失望させてしまった。それだけじゃないわ。信仰と忍耐が我々を…私の力となり、邪悪な異種族の陰謀を断ち切ったのだと、甘く考えていた。私たちは自由への道を歩んでいるのだと。でも実際は…すべて演技にすぎなかった。卑劣な怪物たちは私の愚かさをあざ笑っていたに違いないわ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我再次一叶障目，没能看到邪恶的阴谋……那些人都是忠诚、勇敢的同伴，可我却辜负了他们。不仅如此，我还天真地以为，是信念与毅力让我们冲破了那些异形邪恶的诡计，帮助我们踏上了自由之路。可实际上，那……不过是表演的一部分罢了。那些该死的怪物看到我如此愚蠢，肯定在咯咯怪笑吧。”
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: “我再次一叶障目，没能看到邪恶的阴谋……那些人都是忠诚、勇敢的同伴，可我却辜负了他们。不仅如此，我还天真地以为，是信念与毅力让我们冲破了那些异形邪恶的诡计，帮助我们踏上了自由之路。可实际上，那……不过是表演的一部分罢了。那些该死的怪物看到我如此愚蠢，肯定在咯咯怪笑吧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Una vez más, no fui capaz de ver la maldad donde debería haberla visto... Le fallé a esa gente, leal y valiente. Y eso no es todo. Pensé ingenuamente que la fe y la perseverancia nos habían ayudado, que me habían ayudado, a obstaculizar los planes de los nauseabundos xenos. Que estábamos camino hacia la libertad. Y, en realidad, no era más que otra parte del plan y los viles monstruos debieron estar riéndose a carcajadas mientras observaban mi necedad».
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez más, no fui capaz de ver la maldad donde debería haberla visto... Le fallé a esa gente, leal y valiente. Pero eso no es todo. Pensé ingenuamente que la fe y la perseverancia nos habían ayudado, que me habían ayudado, a obstaculizar los planes de los asquerosos de los xenos. Que estábamos camino hacia la libertad. Aunque, en realidad, no era más que otra parte del plan y los viles monstruos debieron estar riéndose a carcajadas mientras observaban mi necedad».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Erneut habe ich es versäumt, das Böse zu sehen, wo ich es hätte sehen müssen ... Ich habe diese treuen und mutigen Leute im Stich gelassen. Aber nicht nur das. Ich dachte ganz naiv, dass Glaube und Hartnäckigkeit uns geholfen hätten, mir geholfen hätten, die Intrigen verderblicher Xenos zu durchbrechen. Dass wir auf einem Pfad zur Freiheit wären. Aber in Wahrheit ... war das alles nur Teil des Theaters, und die schändlichen Monster haben gewiss sehr über meine Dummheit gelacht."
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: "Erneut habe ich es versäumt, das Böse zu sehen, wo ich es hätte sehen müssen ... Ich habe diese treuen und mutigen Leute im Stich gelassen. Aber das ist noch nicht alles. Ich dachte ganz naiv, dass Glaube und Hartnäckigkeit uns geholfen hätten, mir geholfen hätten, die Intrigen schändlicher Xenos zu durchbrechen. Dass wir auf einem Pfad zur Freiheit wären. Aber in Wahrheit ... war das alles nur Teil des Theaters, und die schändlichen Monster haben sich gewiss über meine Dummheit scheckig gelacht."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Une fois de plus, je n'ai pas vu la malveillance alors qu'elle était juste sous mon nez... J'ai déçu les espoirs de ces pauvres gens, malgré leur loyauté et leur bravoure. Mais ce n'est pas tout. Naïve comme je suis, j'ai cru que la foi et la persévérance nous avaient aidés... ou plutôt m'avaient aidée moi à contrecarrer les plans de ces maudits xénos. J'ai cru que nous étions sur la voie de la liberté. Alors qu'en vérité... tout cela faisait partie de leur petit spectacle. Oh, comme ces viles créatures ont dû se gausser de ma crédulité ! »
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois de plus, je n'ai pas vu la malveillance alors qu'elle était juste sous mon nez... J'ai déçu les espoirs de ces pauvres gens, malgré leur loyauté et leur bravoure. Mais ce n'est pas tout. Naïve comme je suis, j'ai cru que la foi et la persévérance nous avaient aidés... ou plutôt m'avaient aidée moi à contrecarrer les plans de ces maudits xénos. J'ai cru que nous étions sur la voie de la liberté. Alors qu'en vérité... tout cela faisait partie de leur petit spectacle. Oh, comme ces viles créatures ont dû se gausser de ma crédulité ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bir keresinde yine kötülüğü gözden kaçırmıştım... Sadık, cesur insanları yüzüstü bıraktım. Mesele yalnız bu da değil. Saflık ettim, adi zenoların tuzaklarını inançla ve azimle alt ettiğimizi sandım. Özgürlüğe giden yolda yürüdüğümüze inandım. Gelgelelim... Bu saydıklarımın hepsi birer yanılsamaymış. Pis canavarlar, aptallığımı gülerek izliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I once more failed to see wickedness where I should have seen it... I failed those people, loyal and brave. But it is not only that. I thought, naively, that faith and perseverance had helped us — helped me — cut through the schemes of the foul xenos. That we were on a path to freedom. In truth, though... it was all just another part of the act, and the vile monsters must have been cackling with glee as they observed my foolishness."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde yine kötülüğü gözden kaçırmıştım... Sadık, cesur insanları yüzüstü bıraktım. Mesele yalnız bu da değil. Saflık ettim, adi zenoların tuzaklarını inançla ve azimle alt ettiğimizi sandım. Özgürlüğe giden yolda yürüdüğümüze inandım. Gel gelelim... hepsi birer yanılsamaymış. Pis canavarlar aptallığımı gülerek izliyormuş."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
